data.feedback: Epics comprehensively cover ALL user requirements (Sharing UI, Goals UI, Native Integration, Real-time Client). File accuracy verified - all 'filesToModify' files exist in codebase with expected patterns. Native permissions already configured in Android/iOS. Follows established Clean Architecture, BLoC, and get_it patterns. Logical dependency chain and execution order.
